name: Rain of the Dragon
description:
A short game about a dragon trying to make it rain. Made within 48 hours or so.

You only need a mouse to play the game, the dragon follows the movement of the cursor.

Additional Controls:

PausePAdjust Volume
Mouse Wheel
Retry (while Paused)
RExit (while Paused)
E

Due to the short time frame in which the game was made, you might encounter some bugs!

Credits:

  • Mao - Game Design, Art, Programming
  • WingBreaker - Music
  • Shapeforms Audio, Dr-Doctor, Kronbits - SFX
